plot outline: A group of five friends, in search of a hidden treasure, travel to a different village from the city. Whilst in the village, they find it quite bizarre to see that the females are doing the works of males and vice-versa. Their quest to find the treasure becomes difficult as they find it hard to cope with the unique doings of the villagers.
title: Undhinapur
plot: A group of five friends, in search of a hidden treasure, travel to a different village from the city.
